casename: Phua Mong Seng v Public Prosecutor
counsel: S Kumar (SK Kumar & Associates) for the appellant; Daniel Yong (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Offences/Fraudulently inducing persons to invest money/Knowingly making misleading and false statements/Levels of mens rea/s 404(1)(a) Companies Act (Cap 50, 1994 Ed)
Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Imprisonment of four months/Whether sentence manifestly excessive or inadequate/Existence of aggravating factors justifying enhancement of sentence
